title: The Pretenders
description:
The Pretenders came as a post punk band with a good old rock sound but with a twist, a female front person, Chrissie Hynde. Their non compromising rock music and slightly feminist lyrics gave this band a huge success all over the world with their songs unfortunately its another band that still hasnt got all the credits they deserved. Loads and loads of people have heard their songs but dont know them. Still they will forever be remembered as one of the greatest rock bands in history. 

This are all their official full length releases:

1979 Pretenders
1981 Pretenders II
1982 Learning To Crawl
1986 Get Close
1987 The Singles
1990 Packed!
1994 Last Of The Independents
1995 The Isle Of View
1999 Viva el amor
2000 Greatest Hits
2002 Loose Screw
2006 Pretenders Pirate Radio Boxset

The EP Extended Play from 1981 is not in here as a standalone mostly to save some place. All five songs are released on Pretenders II or Pirate Radio Boxset.
